document_data.name: Miller's Dry Goods
document_data.mainbody: '''Miller's Dry Goods''' was a shop in [[Daggerford]] that specialized in the sale of dry goods and household items. It was owned and run by [[Bess Miller]] a local businesswoman who owned three nearby [[grainmill]]s.
document_data.Location: It was located in the town's [[Caravan Quarter]].
document_data.Services: The shop sold all manner of grains and ground flour in addition to a variety of that could be used around the homestead.
